content: HIT-S Plastic screen tube Economical plastic mesh sleeves for light-duty fastenings in hollow masonry using injectable hybrid anchors ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Anchor rods & elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Simplifies light-duty adhesive anchoring in hollow masonry and brick For use with Hilti HIT-HY 270, HY 170, HY 10 and HIT-1 For use with Hilti HIT-HY 270, HY 170, HIT-MM and HIT-1 Applications Light-duty anchor fastening in hollow masonry and brick ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Plastic Base materials: Masonry (hollow) PROFIS Software: No Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Plastic | Base materials | Masonry (hollow) | PROFIS Software | No | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 49766 - Anchor adhesive screen tubes 12/I HIT S - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x K-S 12/50 Mesh sleeve
